text: The Internazionali Femminili di Brescia is a tournament for professional female tennis players played on outdoor clay courts. The event is classified as a $60,000 ITF Women's Circuit tournament and has been held in Brescia, Italy, since 2008. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year
